title: 29 May 14

--- title: "29 May '14" kind: article created_at: 2014-05-29 16:03:53 UTC author: Niharika (Bug reporting system) image: https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/5735280?s=50 categories: GSoC-2014 tags: "news bug-reporting-system python django" layout: post ---

Spent the day studying for my Computer Networks exam. Protocols, DNS, logical & physical addressing, error correction & detection, multiplexing and stuff. Makes me appreciate the hardware projects being done by my fellow GSoC interns more.

Originally posted on Niharika Kohli
